TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CharConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供類型轉換器，將 Unicode 字元物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert Unicode character objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換的字串，長度為 1，與字元。This converter can only convert a string, with a length of 1, to and from a character. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立的執行個體。You should never create an instance of a . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換類型的變數字串變數，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string variable, and vice versa. [!code-cpp[Converters#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Converters#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Converters#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type sourceType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CanConvertFrom (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, sourceType As Type) As Boolean
public: override bool CanConvertFrom(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, Type ^ sourceType);

span.span: An that provides a format context.
A that represents the type you want to convert from.

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否可以使用指定的內容，將指定來源型別中的物件轉換成 Unicode 字元物件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a Unicode character object using the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換的字串，長度為 1，與字元。This converter can only convert a string, with a length of 1, to and from a character. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個轉換器只能轉換的字串，長度為 1，與字元。This converter can only convert a string, with a length of 1, to and from a character. 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

exception.span: 對於目標型別並不是有效的值。

span.span: is not a valid value for the target type.
The conversion cannot be performed.
